Dear Gian Franco:
We are designating Mr. Henry Leff, Director: Radio-TV, City
College of San Francisco, as the NAEB representative on the
Music Jury of Prix Italia.
Mr. Leff is leaving the United States within the next month or
so to spend next year in Italy. I am sure you will find it a
great pleasure to meet him and I know that he will make a great
contribution to the success of the Prix Italia this year.
As I have previously indicated, Mr. Graham Hovey will be NAEB s
representative at the General Assembly.
It is a source of deep chagrin and sorr^/to me that I am inescapably
obligated here in the United States and I am not able to join you m
person in this yearâ€™s Prix Italia meeting. Perhaps before the year
is out I may hve the privilege of visiting Rome again, in which
case I will certainly write to you in advance.
If there is any manner in which I can be of any assistance to you
here in New York, you know you need only call on me.
With every assurance of my highest esteem, believe me dear
Gian Franco,
Cordially yours,
sns -lg
Seymour N. Siegel
Director WNYC
